post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
Hi this is Thomas Lee. Our company, StorageASP, is looking for 3 or 4 full time contractor. It is not fully confirmed but it is matter of time that we are going start fair size project.
Company : StorageASP Location : Victoria Park and 401 Duration : about 3 months language : Java - Server and Web DB : Oracle Application : Storage related *Note : If you are interested in, please forward resume to Judy Yang "judy.yang@storageasp.com I will post more details in later day.
Step 1 : Receive resumes and select qualified applicants StorageASP will pick 10 qualified applicants. Step 2 : StorageASP will hold two to three days of overview presentation and seminar Step 3: Interview
Best Regards,
post.title: Looking for 3 or 4 full time Contracter
